DictionaryName: Building Space and Activity Classification System

Classes.Name: Main Activity Spaces
Classes.Definition: Primary spaces for building occupants' activities
Classes.Description: Core functional spaces that serve the building's primary purpose

Classes.Name: Residential Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for daily living and personal life activities
Classes.Description: Spaces designed for sleeping, eating, personal care, relaxation, and domestic activities

Classes.Name: Work Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for professional and productive activities
Classes.Description: Spaces designed for desk work, meetings, creative work, manufacturing, and service provision

Classes.Name: Learning Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for educational and knowledge acquisition
Classes.Description: Spaces designed for teaching, studying, training, research, and skill development

Classes.Name: Commercial Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for trading and business activities
Classes.Description: Spaces designed for buying, selling, displaying merchandise, storage, and customer service

Classes.Name: Healthcare Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for medical and wellness activities
Classes.Description: Spaces designed for diagnosis, treatment, recovery, therapy, and preventive care

Classes.Name: Main Activity Circulation
Classes.Definition: Circulation spaces integral to main activities
Classes.Description: Circulation spaces that are part of the primary function, such as museum galleries, shopping mall concourses, or hospital corridors

Classes.Name: Support Spaces
Classes.Description: Spaces that enable the functioning of main activity spaces

Classes.Name: Support Circulation Spaces
Classes.Description: Service corridors, fire exits, and other circulation spaces not part of main activities

Classes.Name: Technical Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for building systems and equipment
Classes.Description: Including mechanical rooms, electrical rooms, and equipment spaces

Classes.Name: Parking Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces for vehicle storage and management
Classes.Description: Indoor and outdoor spaces for vehicle parking and related activities

Classes.Name: Interior Parking Spaces
Classes.Description: Including underground and enclosed structured parking facilities

Classes.Name: Exterior Parking Spaces
Classes.Description: Including surface lots and open-air structured parking

Classes.Name: Service Vehicle Spaces
Classes.Description: Including loading docks, delivery areas, and maintenance vehicle parking

Classes.Name: Void Spaces
Classes.Definition: Spaces not suitable for occupancy or activity
Classes.Description: Including vertical shafts, mechanical voids, and inaccessible spaces

Classes.Name: Vertical Void Spaces
Classes.Description: Including elevator shafts, utility shafts, and mechanical risers

Classes.Name: Plenum Spaces
Classes.Description: Including ceiling plenums and raised floor voids

Classes.Name: Structural Voids
Classes.Description: Including wall cavities and structural enclosures

Classes.Name: Multistory Void Spaces
Classes.Definition: Vertical open spaces spanning multiple floors
Classes.Description: Including atria, double-height spaces, and multistory interior volumes and spaces above the last stair

Classes.Name: Outdoor Spaces
Classes.Definition: External spaces associated with the building
Classes.Description: Open-air spaces that complement building functions

Classes.Name: Green Spaces
Classes.Description: Outdoor spaces for recreation, sports, and nature activities

Classes.Name: Recreational Green Spaces
Classes.Description: Areas for playing, picnicking, exercising, and informal sports

Classes.Name: Sports Spaces
Classes.Description: Designated fields and courts for organized sports and games

Classes.Name: Garden Spaces
Classes.Description: Areas for community gardens, landscaping, and urban farming

Classes.Name: Outdoor Circulation
Classes.Description: Including roads, paths, and other outdoor circulation routes

Classes.Name: Roads
Classes.Description: Including access roads, driveways, and service roads

Classes.Name: Pedestrian Circulation
Classes.Description: Including walkways, paths, and outdoor corridors
